import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Login.css' import { loginUser } from '../../services/auth' import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Login (props) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: "", password: "" }) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const userData = await loginUser(formData) props.setCurrentUser(userData) props.history.push('/') } return (<>

Login

) }
